Entry.JapaneseText: [VARIABLE]
Entry.EnglishText: [VARIABLE]

Entry.JapaneseText: キュリア
Entry.EnglishText: Curia

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>

Entry.JapaneseText: 男の人
Entry.EnglishText: Man

Entry.JapaneseText: select
Entry.EnglishText: Select

Entry.JapaneseText: <Annie>
Entry.EnglishText: <Annie>

Entry.JapaneseText: カレギア兵
Entry.EnglishText: Callegean Soldier

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen

Entry.JapaneseText: ノルゼン・民家
Entry.EnglishText: Nolzen - Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: 民家
Entry.EnglishText: Residence

Entry.JapaneseText: 分担して患者さんを診るの！ <Annie>は他のところにいる 患者さんを診てあげて！
Entry.EnglishText: We need to coordinate with the treatment of the patients! Go help the others!

Entry.JapaneseText: ここはいいから、 <Annie>を連れて 他の患者さんのところへ 行ってくれる？
Entry.EnglishText: I'm fine here. Can you accompany <Annie> while she helps the other patients?

Entry.JapaneseText: あなたたち！ すぐに<Eugene>のところへ……！
Entry.EnglishText: You need to go to where <Eugene> is...!

Entry.JapaneseText: 私もこの患者から 離れられないの！ 早く！
Entry.EnglishText: I can't leave this patient! Hurry!

Entry.JapaneseText: <Hilda>さんを……？ あの娘……まさか……!!
Entry.EnglishText: You need <Hilda>...? What is <Annie> planning on doing?

Entry.JapaneseText: <Veigue>、早く<Hilda>さんを <Annie>のところへ連れて 行ってあげて！
Entry.EnglishText: <Veigue>, get <Hilda> to <Annie> as soon as possible!

Entry.JapaneseText: わ、わかった……！
Entry.EnglishText: G-Got it...!

Entry.JapaneseText: よくやったわね！ その調子でがんばって！
Entry.EnglishText: You're doing great! Keep up the good work!

Entry.JapaneseText: 早く、診てあげて……！
Entry.EnglishText: Hurry up and examine the patients...!
Entry.Notes: this+above all seem like main cast dialogue so I'm just gonna leave them

Entry.JapaneseText: <Cyan>幻の庭<White>……この辺には、 そういう言い伝えはないと 思うけどね……
Entry.EnglishText: The <Cyan>Garden of Illusions<White>...? No, I don't think I've heard of anything like that...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマとなんか 口も聞きたくないね。 さっさと出てってくれ。
Entry.EnglishText: I have no desire to talk to Huma. Get out of my house.

Entry.JapaneseText: この前の騒ぎは大変だったよ。 カレギア軍が来てくれたから、 ようやく落ち着いたけど……
Entry.EnglishText: That fight from earlier could have been so much worse. Good thing the army came and restored order.

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、ヒューマ！ 勝手に人の家に入るな！ せっかくの料理がマズくなる！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, Huma! Don't go barging into people's houses! You'll ruin my cooking!
Entry.Notes: I guess this could technically be any meal, not just dinner

Entry.JapaneseText: バイラスが街を襲ったんだ！ ウチにもケガ人が 運ばれて来たよ……！
Entry.EnglishText: Biruses attacked this city! Some of the injured were brought here to my house...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマの次はバイラスか！ ああ、ゆっくりメシも作れない！
Entry.EnglishText: First Huma, and now Biruses! I'm never going to be able to cook in peace...

Entry.JapaneseText: お、おまえたち…… ガジュマを治療するなんて…… 何が目的だ……？
Entry.EnglishText: Why are you helping tend to the Gajuma...? Just what is in it for you...?

Entry.JapaneseText: お、俺はヒューマなんかに 感謝しないからな……
Entry.EnglishText: I-It's not like I want to thank you Huma, or anything...

Entry.JapaneseText: おい、ケガ人がいるんだ。 用もないヒューマが 入って来るんじゃないよ！
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, we've got injured here! I don't need any freeloading Huma hanging around!

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたの連れのヒューマたちは 一体どういう奴らなんだ……？
Entry.EnglishText: What's up with those Huma you're traveling with...?

Entry.JapaneseText: 本当にガジュマを憎んだり してないのか？
Entry.EnglishText: Do they really not hate Gajuma?

Entry.JapaneseText: ちょっと人を助けたぐらいで いい気になるなよ……
Entry.EnglishText: Don't get all high and mighty just because you helped some people...
Entry.Notes: if this is directly connected to the previous box it might need to be worded differently

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマもいよいよ終わりだな。 女王様を殺そうとした罪は重い。 これからが見ものだな……
Entry.EnglishText: The Huma are done for. They've gone too far by trying to kill the Queen. I can't wait to see what happens now...

Entry.JapaneseText: おいヒューマ…… ベルサスでの話、聞いたぞ。
Entry.EnglishText: Hey, Huma, I heard about what happened in Belsas.

Entry.JapaneseText: 女王様を殺そうとするなんて、 アタマがイカれちまってる！ 信じられないよ……
Entry.EnglishText: You all are insane for trying to kill the Queen! I can't believe it...!

Entry.JapaneseText: あんたもガジュマなら、 そろそろヒューマと 手を切ったほうがいい。
Entry.EnglishText: As a Gajuma, it's high time to cut off all ties with Huma.

Entry.JapaneseText: これからはガジュマ優勢の 世の中になるんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: Gajuma will be the ones ruling society from now on, after all...

Entry.JapaneseText: ふん……ヒューマが気安く ガジュマに声をかけられるのも 今のうちだ……
Entry.EnglishText: Hmph... Enjoy being able to strike up a casual conversation with Gajuma while you can...

Entry.JapaneseText: な、なんだよーこれ!! コワイよー！
Entry.EnglishText: Wh-What is that?! I'm freaking out!

Entry.JapaneseText: な、なんだよ！ コ、コワくなんかねーぞ……!!
Entry.EnglishText: Wh-What's going on?! N-Not that I'm scared or anything...!

Entry.JapaneseText: そもそも、この国の王は ガジュマなんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: This country's ruler is a Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマこそ優れた存在で、 ヒューマは俺たちに従うべきだ。 そう思わないかい？
Entry.EnglishText: Shouldn't the Huma be the ones bowing to us, considering we are superior to them?

Entry.JapaneseText: そもそも、この国の王は ガジュマなんだ！
Entry.EnglishText: This country's ruler is a Gajuma!

Entry.JapaneseText: ガジュマこそ優れた存在で、 ヒューマは俺たちに従うべきだ。 よく考えな……フン！
Entry.EnglishText: We Gajuma are superior, so you should be bowing down to us! Think about it... Hmph!
Entry.Notes: guessing the previous set was speaking to the guy as a gajuma, and these two are speaking as huma

Entry.JapaneseText: し、漆黒トリオに…… 感動しちまったよ……
Entry.EnglishText: The Dark Wings' actions really moved me...

Entry.JapaneseText: 俺は、種族にこだわってたのに、 そんな事、考えもしない漆黒トリオに 感動しちまったんだ……
Entry.EnglishText: I had been so hung up on race, but those thoughts didn't even cross my mind when I saw them...

Entry.JapaneseText: ヒューマなんかと 仲良くするなんて、 ヘンだよ、ヘン！
Entry.EnglishText: Associating with Huma is wrong! Wrong, I say!

Entry.JapaneseText: ……なんだよ、ヒューマが。 こっちには用はないんだよ！
Entry.EnglishText: ...What do you want? You have no business here, Huma!

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0><scale:140>休憩しますか？ はい いいえ
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0><scale:140>Would you like to rest? Yes No

Entry.JapaneseText: がんばってください。 今、治療します。
Entry.EnglishText: Please hang in there. I'm going to take care of you.

Entry.JapaneseText: もう大丈夫です。
Entry.EnglishText: You should be fine now.

Entry.JapaneseText: ふぅ……楽になったよ…… 小さな先生、ありがとう……
Entry.EnglishText: Phew... I feel so much better. Thanks for the help, little doctor.

Entry.JapaneseText: ああ……楽になったら…… 眠くなってきた……
Entry.EnglishText: Now that the pain's gone, I'm getting sleepy...

Entry.JapaneseText: ダメだ……もう…… ダメだあ……
Entry.EnglishText: This is too much...

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『人魚と靴屋のハンス』 カレギアの童話のひとつ。 ノルゼンに伝わる民話を もとに書かれた作品。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- The Cobbler and the Mermaid - A popular fairy tale that traces its origins to the folklore of Nolzen.
Entry.Notes: is this a thing that's come up elsewhere? could just call it "Hans and the Mermaid"

Entry.JapaneseText: <speed:0>『人魚と靴屋のハンス』 人魚の娘と恋に落ちた靴屋のハンス。 最高の靴を作ってプレゼントしようと するが、彼女は履く事ができない。 カレギア四大喜劇のひとつ。
Entry.EnglishText: <speed:0>- The Cobbler and the Mermaid - A story about a man named Hans who falls in love with a mermaid. He crafts the finest pair of shoes for her, but she is unable to wear them. One of Callegea's four Great Comedies.
Entry.Notes: unless the other three are mentioned elsewhere you can probably just make stuff up about this
